channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How to Watch Apple's iPhone 16 Launch Event, and What to Expect
item.description: The next iPhone and Apple Watch will be unveiled during a splashy event on September 9. Here's how to tune in.

item.title: Xavier Niel replaces Coatue’s Laffont on board of TikTok parent ByteDance
item.description: French billionaire Xavier Niel is joining the board of directors of TikTok’s parent, ByteDance, the company told the South China Morning Post. It’s an...

item.title: Best Labor Day Deals (2024): TVs, AirPods Max, and More
item.description: Now's your chance to save cash on TVs, smart speakers, and Kindles.

item.title: Clearview AI hit with its largest GDPR fine yet as Dutch regulator considers holding execs personally liable
item.description: The Netherlands' data protection authority has imposed a penalty of €30.5M on Clearview AI for GDPR violations. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved...

item.title: 16 Best Crossplay Games for Consoles and PC (2024): Xbox, PlayStation, Switch, Mobile
item.description: These titles let you play with friends on all kinds of platforms, from computers to Xbox, PlayStation, Switch, and even mobile.

item.title: X lets you edit DMs — here is how to use the feature
item.description: X, the social network owned by Elon Musk, is finally rolling out one of the most sought-after features for direct messages: the ability to edit the me...

item.title: Strange Noises Are Coming from Inside Boeing’s Starliner Spacecraft
item.description: Speakers inside the spacecraft are producing a pulsing noise, and neither astronauts nor Mission Control can identify its cause.

item.title: Laptop-leasing startup Fleet wants to become the IT companion for small companies
item.description: Fleet is launching several software services on top of its hardware-as-a-service proposition, from device management to cybersecurity and insurance. ©...

item.title: Laptop Buying Guide (2024): How to Choose the Right PC (Step-by-Step Guide)
item.description: Shopping for a laptop can be infuriating. Here’s how to sift through the acronyms, storage options, and extra features to find the best one for you.

item.title: Ziina banks $22M as growth explodes for the UAE-based fintech for small businesses
item.description: The Dubai-based startup, which now counts 50,000 retail and business customers in the UAE, has netted $22 million led by Altos Ventures. © 2024 TechCr...
